DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety 800 mg MSI-195 reducing symptom depression Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) patient inadequate response current antidepressant therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Add-On Study MSI-195 ( S-Adenosyl-L-Methionine , SAMe ) Patients With Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.criteria: Meets Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorder , 4th Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) A total score 16 high Hamilton Rating Scale Depression 17 item version ( HAMD17 ) Screening Baseline Visits , score â‰¥2 mood item 1 . Have experience 14 prior Major Depressive Episodes . Patients 5 lifetime episode ( include current episode ) require discussion medical monitor prior inclusion . Failed 13 treatment regimen current depressive episode Received adequate dose duration Antidepressant Therapy ( ADT ) ( ADT least 6 week stable dose least 3 week ) Failed 4 adequate treatment regimen current episode depression patient may significant risk suicidal behavior course participation study Intolerance SAMe ; Prior use MSI195 History follow psychiatric disorder : eat disorder within 6 month ; obsessive compulsive disorder , psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , mental retardation , dementia form cognitive impairment time alcohol substance abuse > 3X upper limit normal ( ULN ) Alkaline Phosphatase , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ; > 1.5X ULN total bilirubin Pregnant lactate woman Any history seizure , exclude febrile seizure Known positivity human immunodeficiency virus
